en: Camp McCoy NCO Mess membership card
A membership card for non-commissioned officers training at Camp McCoy. The card entitles its holder to all membership privileges of the Camp McCoy NCO Mess.

none: Camp McCoy NCO Mess membership card, front

en: The front of the membership card includes Wallace's signature and states that he is entitled to all membership privileges. Also present is the signature of the President (Msgt. Leslie E.).
